## IncomingMessage.setHeader() method

Replace the value of the given header by the value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setHeader(name: string, value: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | header name |
|  value | string | header value |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
